Sorry, we couldn’t find that

Although it's probably our fault with this stupid redesign and whatnot, we regret that we could not find what you were looking for. Don't worry, though, because there's help. We have tools, you see.

Here’s a few ways to find what you’d wanted.

Search 43 Folders

Web 43folders.com

Browse around

  • Start with the home page
  • View archives by date
  • View the archives by category
  • Check out the post stats (very informative stuff)

Try the Tag Cloud

We’re in the process of tagging all our posts to make it easier to find stuff. Give it a spin.
